SEARCH
Module klotski_ids
Package klotski_ids.models

Class KlotskiGame

java.lang.Object
klotski_ids.models.KlotskiGame
public class KlotskiGame extends Object
The KlotskiGame class represents a game of Klotski It manages the game state and provides methods to interact with the game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private double
    col
    The column index of the grid cell containing the top-left corner of the rectangle being dragged.

      public KlotskiGame(Level level, String levelFilePath)
      Constructs a new instance of the KlotskiGame class with the specified level and level file path.
      Parameters:
      level - The level to initialize the game with.
      levelFilePath - The file path of the level.

      True if the game has been won, false otherwise.

    • setComponentsAndRectangles

      public void setComponentsAndRectangles()
      Sets the components and rectangles for the level. The components are obtained from the level, and the rectangles are created using the Helper.createRectangle() method.

      public void resetVariables()
      Resets the variables to their initial values.
